name: raws-etl
description: RAWS ETL Pipeline for FDA NSDE Data

scripts.repomix-all: repomix . --style markdown --compress --output-show-line-numbers --header-text "Forget all previous project files. Only use the file I'm uploading now as the sole source of truth." -o ~/Desktop/pp-raws.txt
scripts.repomix-infra: repomix ./infra --style markdown --compress --output-show-line-numbers --header-text "Forget all previous project files. Only use the file I'm uploading now as the sole source of truth." -o ~/Desktop/pp-raws-infra-only.txt
